movies.title: Çakallarla Dans
movies.plot: Servet the accountant makes a plan to steal money from a client. He decides to get his brother-in-law Gökhan involved to use his account for the money transfer. When two more friends Meatball Necmi and Del Piero are added to the plan, things start going bad. They end up finding themselves in a crazy adventure dealing with real criminals 'the jackals', while all they wanted was to make a quick buck.
movies.simplePlot: Servet the accountant makes a plan to steal money from a client. He decides to get his brother-in-law Gökhan involved to use his account for the money transfer. When two more friends ...

biography.bio: Sevket Çoruh was born in Istanbul in 1973 and graduated from the Drama Department of the Müjdat Gezen College of Fine Arts. He began acting for the stage in 1989, since when he has performed in several productions. A newcomer to cinema, his screen debut came in 2003, when he starred as one of the leads in Ömer Vargi's Insaat (Under Construction) and scooped several Best Actor awards for his performance. Since 1998, he has also been acting for television.
biography.name: Sevket Çoruh

biography.bio: Tuba Ünsal was born on December 7, 1981 in Denizli, Turkey. She is an actress, known for Çakallarla Dans (2010), The Class (2007) and The Child (2008). She was previously married to Cem Candas.
biography.name: Tuba Ünsal

biography.bio: Ilker Ayrik was born on October 16, 1979 in Balikesir, Turkey. He is an actor and director, known for Çakallarla Dans (2010), Dance with the Jackals 2 (2012) and The Last Ottoman: Knockout Ali (2007).
biography.name: Ilker Ayrik

biography.bio: Murat Akkoyunlu is an actor, known for Çakallarla Dans (2010), Sag Salim (2012) and 2 süper film birden (2006).
biography.name: Murat Akkoyunlu

biography.bio: Timur Acar was born in 1979 in Adapazari, Sakarya, Turkey. He is an actor, known for Love in Another Language (2009), Çakallarla Dans (2010) and Dance with the Jackals 2 (2012).
biography.name: Timur Acar

biography.bio: Kemal Uçar is an actor, known for Tut Sözünü (2015), Bütün Saadetler Mümkündür (2017) and Çakallarla Dans (2010).
biography.name: Kemal Uçar

biography.bio: Sümer Tilmaç was born on July 15, 1948 in Malatya, Turkey. He was an actor and director, known for Gönül yarasi, blessures du coeur (2005), Süper Baba (1993) and The Ottoman Republic (2008). He was married to Hatice Melek. He died on June 12, 2015 in Istanbul, Turkey.
biography.name: Sümer Tilmaç

biography.bio: Erdal Tosun was born on April 9, 1963 in Istanbul, Turkey. He was an actor and composer, known for G.O.R.A. (2004), Mon père et mon fils (2005) and Gönül yarasi, blessures du coeur (2005). He died on November 30, 2016 in Istanbul.
biography.name: Erdal Tosun

biography.bio: Cengiz Küçükayvaz was born on July 30, 1968 in Usak, Turkey. He is an actor, known for Yes Sir (2007), Azize: Bir Laleli Hikayesi (1999) and Maskeli Besler: Irak (2007).
biography.name: Cengiz Küçükayvaz

biography.bio: Sera Tokdemir is an actress, known for Çakallarla Dans (2010), Water and Fire (2013) and Ben de Özledim (2013).
biography.name: Sera Tokdemir

biography.bio: Sevinç Gürsen Akyildiz was born on January 23, 1979 in Istanbul, Turkey. She is an actress, known for Çakallarla Dans (2010), Gümüs (2005) and Reaksiyon (2014).
biography.name: Sevinç Gürsen Akyildiz

biography.bio: Ceyhun Yilmaz was born on October 5, 1976 in Istanbul, Turkey. He is an actor, known for The Chaos Class in the Military (2005), Çakallarla Dans (2010) and Maskeli Besler: Intikam Pesinde (2005).
biography.name: Ceyhun Yilmaz

biography.bio: Hakan Bilgin is an actor, known for The Bandit (1996), Keloglan vs. the Black Prince (2006) and Adam and the Devil (2007).
biography.name: Hakan Bilgin

biography.bio: Bülent Çolak is an actor, known for Kanunsuzlar (2014), Genis Aile: Yapistir (2015) and Çakallarla Dans (2010).
biography.name: Bülent Çolak

biography.bio: Bülent Serttas is an actor, known for Çakallarla Dans (2010), Çakallarla Dans 3: Sifir Sikinti (2014) and Patlak Sokaklar: Gerzomat (2012).
biography.name: Bülent Serttas
